name: π-mon says
description:
Simon says with the digits of pi made in 3 hours and 14 minutes on 3/14/2021 for pi day

Use the numpad or number keys or your keyboard or click the numbers with your mouse.

Repeat the sequence as you memorize the digits of pi!

You can change the speed of the simon says with the buttons below the game screen, as well as show the sequence again if you haven't already started.

The game saves checkpoints at every 10 points, but you can start over at the beginning if you want. Press load to go back to the previous checkpoint.
